concept.title: How to help?
concept.shortdesc: The best ways to contribute are by finding and reporting bugs, participating in community support, and improving the code.

section.title: Reporting bugs
section.p: We use GitHub as our issue tracker.

section.title: Community support
section.p: Answer DITA-OT related questions at DITA users group.

section.title: Patch the code
section.p: You can contribute fixes to bugs or new features by sending pull requests at GitHub.
